title: Junior Backend Engineer (Node.js)
description: Develop and maintain backend systems using Node.js, Express.js and MongoDB. Contribute to API design and implementation.

title: Associate Software Engineer (Python)
description: Develop backend applications with Python, Django/Flask. Write unit tests and integrate with databases. Collaborate with frontend team.

title: Backend Developer - Entry Level
description: Build scalable backend solutions with Java. Work on RESTful APIs and microservices architecture. Participate in code reviews.

title: Junior Backend Engineer (PHP/Laravel)
description: Design, develop and maintain web applications using PHP and Laravel framework. Implement database schemas and optimize queries.

title: Software Engineer Intern (Backend)
description: Assist in building backend systems using various technologies. Learn best practices in software development. Contribute to projects.

title: Trainee Software Engineer (Backend)
description: Learn and implement backend solutions. Work on various projects, gaining experience in databases and API development.

title: Junior Java Developer
description: Design and develop backend systems utilizing Java frameworks. Focus on scalability and performance of the codebase.

title: Graduate Software Engineer - Backend
description: Design, develop, test and deploy backend systems focusing on Node.js/Python. Follow agile methodologies and collaborate with teams.
